p: Table 1 summarizes the main data from the 57 selected studies. The majority of the studies were performed in Caucasian and Asian populations. The studies were carried out in fourteen different countries (Mexico, China, Russia, Germany, Taiwan, USA, Japan, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Australia, and Greece) assembling patients from twenty countries (Mexico, China, Russia, Germany, Taiwan, USA, Japan, Spain, Italy, Norway, Netherlands, Serbia, Ireland, Australia, France, Greece, Poland, Sweden, Iran, and Australia). Sample sizes varied from 91 to 5302 patients in PD groups. The mean age at onset of PD varied from 45.2 to 68.2 years old.
